alert.note: Alert for Concho; Runnels; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 03 at 10:02PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Tom Green, southwestern Runnels and northwestern Concho Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1002 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Nasworthy, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lake Nasworthy around 1005 PM CDT. Goodfellow Air Force Base around 1015 PM CDT. Wall around 1020 PM CDT. Veribest around 1030 PM CDT. Vancourt around 1035 PM CDT. Eola and Mereta around 1040 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Vick and The Intersection Of Ranch Road 380 And Ranch Road 381. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
